an10.215:1: "Bhikkhus, possessing ten qualities, a female lay follower dwells without self-confidence at home. What ten? () She destroys life … and (0) holds wrong view. Possessing these ten qualities, a female lay follower dwells without self-confidence at home.
an10.215:2: "Bhikkhus, possessing ten qualities, a female lay follower dwells self-confident at home. What ten? (1) She abstains from the destruction of life … and (10) holds right view. Possessing these ten qualities, a female lay follower dwells self-confident at home."
